dict.acceptation: 使人惊讶的，出人意料的，惊人的；惊人的，意外的；奇怪的，不可思议的；
使惊奇，使诧异( surprise的现在分词)；意外发现[撞见]，出其不意获得；

sent.orig: Surprising as that may be,more surprising was that Beau never moved either.
sent.trans: 这已经令人感到意外，可更使我吃惊的是博也一动不动。

sent.orig: Policemen surprising perhaps, one will be looked to me that you down and train.
sent.trans: 吃惊的警察大概摸不准，打量了我一会才说，你们坐下班车。

sent.orig: It was a bIt'surprising, but not really.
sent.trans: 有点奇怪，但是不会太奇怪。

sent.orig: In a surprising denouement, she becomes a nun.
sent.trans: 结局出人意表，她当修女了。

sent.orig: If he cannot become the team round I to think that can indeed be surprising.
sent.trans: 如果他不能成为球队首发我觉得的确会令人惊讶。
